high_descs: Turn right, walk to the wall, then turn left and walk up to the table.
Pick up the cardboard box that is on the table.
Move back from the table a bit.
Turn on the lamp that is on the table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while holding a cardboard box.

high_descs: Turn to your right and go to the folding table, behind the white chair, in the left corner of the room.
Pick up the cardboard box, in front of the lamp, on the folding table.
Move back from the folding table.
Turn on the lamp on the folding table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the living room lamp.

high_descs: Turn right, take a left at the wall and walk to the wooden table in the corner next to the chair.
Pick up the cardboard box on the left side of the table.
Turn right, walk forward and face the small lamp on the wooden table on the left.
Turn on the small lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a box by the light of a small lamp.
